title: EkAmbara nAthA
sahitya:
EkAmbara nAthA kacci EkAmbara nAthA ini enmurai kETTu nI innaruL purivAi


anupallavi

  bhOgam pala tEDi lOka bhOgam pala tEDip-pozhudai 
vINAkkinEn nAgam aNiyum IshA nayana mUnruDaiyavOr


caraNam    kAmanai erittum kAlanai kaDindadum kaN mAyamO-venru karuduginrEnE 
kAmanin tuyarAl kalanguginrEn ayyA kAlan varAmal ennaik-kAppadun kaDan anrO
